level.heading: Benefits not attachable.
level.text: No money or other benefit, charity, relief, or aid to be paid, provided, or rendered by any society, shall be liable to attachment, garnishment, or other process, or to be seized, taken, appropriated, or applied by any legal or equitable process or operation of law to pay any debt or liability of a member or beneficiary, or any other person who may have a right thereunder, either before or after payment by the society.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-5301.
